spec.name: Stade Laarbi Ben Mubarak
spec.description: Stade Laarbi Ben Mubarak (Larbi Benbarek Stadium) is a sports stadium named after the legendary Moroccan football player **Larbi Benbarek** (1917–1992), often called the 'Black Pearl,' who played for teams like Olympique de Marseille and Atlético Madrid. The stadium is a local sports venue primarily used for football matches, serving the community's recreational and competitive sports needs.

people.comment: Legendary Moroccan football player after whom the stadium is named.
